name: New patients started on ART
definition: Number of adults and children newly enrolled on antiretroviral therapy

name: Patients currently on ART
definition: Number of adults and children currently receiving antiretroviral therapy

name: HIV tests positive
definition: Number of individuals who received HIV testing services and tested positive

name: TB screening completed
definition: Number of patients screened for tuberculosis

name: Antenatal care 1st visit
definition: Number of pregnant women attending first antenatal care visit
